invoice.notes:
Initial Addition Invoice:
-Demolition, site clearing, permits, and preparation
-Foundation
-Flatwork
-Front porch masonry
-First floor framing
invoice.title: Initial Addition Invoice

materials.description: Task: Equipment for lot clearing  Description: Dump truck for one day. Trailer for full day. Skidsteer for half day. Excavator for full day. All equpiment for lot clearing first day. $400 + $400 + $375 + $400

labors.description: Worker Oliver McGraw Task: 345 Description: Deliver excavator
Worker Oliver McGraw Task: 345 Description: Mobalize skidsteer, dump truck, and dump trailer. Clear lot. Demolish fences. Run to landfill for one load of trash.

Worker Oliver McGraw Task: Two carpenters shore up front porch roof using construction lumber and jacks.395 Description: Shore and demolish front porch. Other misc tasks. Run trash to landfill. Help fill in back yard cistern.
Worker Oliver McGraw Task: 594 Description: Layout and dig footings. Place gravel and fill in porch and compact.
Worker Oliver McGraw Task: 594 Description: Place footings. Start interior demo. Stop traffic for front porch placement.
Worker Oliver McGraw Task: 405 Description: Load another load of dirt. Move block around on site for mason.
Worker Oliver McGraw Task: Demolition of existing roof on rear of building. Misc upstairs demolition.371 Description: begin demolition with james. mark out walls for demolition.
Worker Oliver McGraw Task: Demolition of existing roof on rear of building. Misc upstairs demolition.371 Description: interior demolition, checking on mechanicals, clean porch and yard.
Worker Tommy Coonan Task: 594 Description: dig footing, compact fill in porch

Worker Tommy Coonan Task: Demolition of existing roof on rear of building. Misc upstairs demolition.371 Description: Moved skid steer. Walked through house planned. Bought tools. Moved appliances protected floors hung plastic removed trim, cabinets and drop ceiling
Worker Tommy Coonan Task: Demolition of existing roof on rear of building. Misc upstairs demolition.371 Description: Began demolition in kitchen
Worker Tommy Coonan Task: Demolition of existing roof on rear of building. Misc upstairs demolition.371 Description: Demo kitchen cabinets, kitchen tile floor and cleared and protected basement

Worker Tommy Coonan Task: Demolition of existing roof on rear of building. Misc upstairs demolition.371 Description: Removed ceiling in bathroom

Worker Tommy Coonan Task: Demolition of existing roof on rear of building. Misc upstairs demolition.371 Description: Removed floor in kitchen. Removed framing in kitchen. Pulled nails in all rooms. Removed electrical. Removed pex plumbing
Worker Brandon Jackson Task: 605 Description: Began Moving equipment. Went to Constances to pick Up Skidsteer. Left early becuse of knee pain.
Worker Brandon Jackson Task: 399 Description: Ran excavator to remove front porch and removed cistern in rear.
Worker Brandon Jackson Task: 605 Description: Took a load of trash from job site to landfill. Picked up a load of 53's for Dylan's front porch and garage floor pad.
Worker Brandon Jackson Task: 399 Description: Unloaded menards delivery with driver. Picked up dump truck at Dylan's. Drive to shop for sand. Returned sand to Dylan's.
Worker Brandon Jackson Task: 399 Description: Installed fill dirt into porch.
Worker Brandon Jackson Task: 402 Description: Dug out foundation with excavator. Excavator hours should match operator hours
Worker Brandon Jackson Task: 402 Description: Picked up sand. Stopped clock because went to Jefferson.
Worker Brandon Jackson Task: 593 Description: Finished delivering sand. Picked up dirt
Worker Brandon Jackson Task: 593 Description: Backfilled footer trench. Cut driveway grade. Cut sidewalk step grade. Loaded out 1 load of dirt to Oliver's.
Worker Brandon Jackson Task: 422 Description: Trucked and 53's and twos installed twos and 53s on driveway and garage floor. Loaded out one load of dirt to Olivers house
Worker Brandon Jackson Task: 578 Description: Hauled in stone. Installed stone
Worker Brandon Jackson Task: 379 Description: Dug out sidewalk and steps. Installed stone. Loaded out excavator.
Worker Brandon Jackson Task: 440 Description: Moved excavator from Constances to Dylans. Unloaded and began tearing out aluminum fence.

Worker Brandon Jackson Task: 440 Description: Continued tearing out alumininum fence. tore out wood fence in Caseys back yard. Drilled holes for gaurd rail. Installed dirt around front porch. Rough graded yard.
Worker Brandon Jackson Task: Demolition of existing roof on rear of building. Misc upstairs demolition.371 Description: Continue demoing kitchen dining room upstairs.

Worker Brandon Jackson Task: 423 Description: Went to Menards for lumber concrete and carriage bolts went to steel house for I-beams. Went to shop for trailer and tools to install guard rail. Installed I-beams poured with Concrete
Worker Brandon Jackson Task: 402 Description: Dug out foundation by back door for Nick
